label: ham
to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: Debian install with Software Speech?
body: 87. These nations alone served 80 as cavalry, and the number of the cavalry proved to be eight myriads, 81 apart from the camels and the chariots. Now the rest of the cavalry was arrayed in squadrons, but the Arabians were placed after them and last of all, for the horses could not endure the camels, and therefore they were placed last, in order that the horses might not be frightened.
